name: Pyratopia
description:
Some simple game that inspired from handheld LCD games. This game theme is based on the myth that aliens build a pyramid. The alien that you see in this game are called "pyra" and the game set place in their home planet "pyratopia". This game I made in wick editor. The game will have long loading time only at first time that you play the game.

How to play :

Press Left or Right arrow key to move pyra and catch  a block then give to staff. Pyras are weak they can hold only 1 block or they'll get squished. If you miss 3 times game over.

How to get score : 

  • Give block to staff get 1 point
  • Make full pyramid get 10 points
  • If you brave enough to press left while holding a block, you get 20 points.

Font that I used in game:

  • Major mono display by Emre Parlak
  • Text Me One by Julia Petretta

Things to add :

  • Background music and variation of game speed (Must wait until the music is done).
  • Touch controls for mobile support (I just realized that you can play on mobile browser in itch.io)

Game SFX and music by iLikeCola12
